facts.content: Octopuses have three hearts and blue blood! 🐙 Two hearts pump blood to the gills, while the third pumps blood to the rest of the body.
A day on Venus is longer than its year! ⭐ Venus takes 243 Earth days to rotate once, but only 225 Earth days to orbit the Sun.
章鱼有三颗心脏和蓝色的血液！🐙 两颗心脏将血液泵送到鳃部，第三颗心脏将血液泵送到身体其他部位。

questions.content: If you could have dinner with any person from history, who would it be and what would you ask them? 🤔
What would the world look like if colors had sounds? 🎨🎵
如果你可以与历史上的任何人共进晚餐，你会选择谁，你会问他们什么？🤔

jokes.content: Why don't scientists trust atoms? Because they make up everything! ⚛️😄
I told my wife she was drawing her eyebrows too high. She looked surprised! 😮
为什么科学家不相信原子？因为它们编造一切！⚛️😄
